/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The street is lined with trees and buildings, creating a corridor of urban life. People can be seen walking on the sidewalks, going about their day, while cars are parked along the side of the road. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the scene. The sun is shining brightly, casting shadows and highlighting the colors of the cityscape. The image is bathed in natural daylight, enhancing the details and colors of the scene.
